Text:
The NSA is going to take away your internets. Then a CIA rendition team will come for you with all of the savagery of the black hood and needle....When you awake, you too will be in Egypt.

http://abcnews.go.com/Blotter/egypt-crisis-omar-suleiman-cia-rendition/story?id=12812445

Thank you for this! Was looking for the new documentary about Gene Sharp, which has been shown on US television, but so far not here. Ran into this, which is completely wonderful all by itself. To find out who this guy is, check http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-middle-east-12522848 where you will learn that he is "the man now credited with the strategy behind the toppling of the Egyptian government.
Gene Sharp is the world's foremost expert on non-violent revolution. His work has been translated into more than 30 languages, his books slipped across borders and hidden from secret policemen all over the world."

Saul Alinsky for a new generation! As they say in Manhattan, "You cannot evict an idea whose time has come." Occupy the planet!

Thank you so much for this torrent, I will seed and spread to other sites as well.  I just finished the 45min show that was recorded from a cable channel "Current".  I plan to convert it to an avi and upload it.  There is supposed to be a longer feature sometime in the near future.  When it is aired, the torrent for it will follow shortly.
